thread.title: William
thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: Installed on my wife's bike and she loves it. Her arthritic knees are forever grateful. Easy installation; people don't even realize the bike has an electric motor until she motors away without pedaling. Thanks!
